description.diamond-pearl:
The user charges at
the foe using every
bit of its power.
The user must rest
on the next turn.

The user charges at
the foe using every
bit of its power.
The user must rest
on the next turn.

The user must rest

The user must rest on the next turn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
